thread.section_title: White Mountain Puzzles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of White Mountain Puzzles | whitemountainpuzzles.com
thread.title: Karen McNamara
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Karen McNamara

author: Karen McNamara
title: Karen McNamara
text: Love love love the retro and nostagic puzzles! Can't wait for more new ones to come out! Have recommended you to several people. I called customer service to order a gift card and to inquire about replacing missing pieces. The lady was extremely pleasant and very helpful. I hung up the phone feeling even better about your company as if that was even possible! So glad I discovered these puzzles. The entire family gets involved and lately there is always one in progress on the dining room table.
